thread.title_full: Amateur cricketer breaks 15 bones after struck by ball | Daily Mail Online

author: Alex Martin For Mailonline
title: Amateur cricketer breaks 15 bones after struck by ball | Daily Mail Online
text: Amateur cricketer breaks 15 bones in his face including his skull, nose, cheekbones and eye sockets after he is struck by ball while bowling in nets Alex Tait faces lengthy rehabilitation and invasive surgery after horrific injury Tait confirmed he will retire from both cricket and football after freak accident Crowdfunding aims to raise Â£10,000 to help Tait cope with the cost of living Tait is a family man with a young son and a baby due in just four months time England captain Joe Root has already donated to the cause as has David Lloyd Published: 11:45 GMT, 23 February 2017 | Updated: 12:52 GMT, 23 February 2017 7 shares
